entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
